record.field: Welcome to the iN-Clue Journey with Your Team

Welcome to the iN-Clue Journey

Dear ,

Congratulations — you and your team are about to embark on the iN-Clue Journey.

As a manager, it's helpful to have some context about why this journey was created and what to expect — without giving too much away so you can enjoy it just like the rest of your team.

Creating a safe and healthy work environment isn't just the manager's responsibility. Just like physical safety, psychological safety is a shared responsibility — we all play a role in creating it.

The difference? While physical safety often relies on common rules for everyone, psychological safety is more nuanced. It's shaped by our individual experiences and needs.

As a manager, it's not always easy to focus on this, make time for it, or find the right language that is respectful without feeling intrusive.

That's why we created the iN-Clue Journey.

The experience helps people connect with themselves and with each other — at their own pace. The first session offers an opportunity to move beyond roles and assumptions, and to meet each other on a deeper human level.

After that, your team will take part in 6 short follow-up sessions (each lasting no more than 35 minutes), where you'll explore six aspects of psychological safety — which you experienced during the first session — and reflect on how your team is doing.

These moments help build shared language and awareness that can support stronger collaboration.

The entire process will be facilitated by your certified internal facilitator: .

To track the impact of the journey, your team will be invited to complete a short 6-question survey before and after the first session, and again after the final follow-up session.

Wishing you a meaningful and rewarding journey,

Warm regards,

Alan De Bruyne
Creator of the iN-Clue Journey
